content: At the moment, normal users cannot delete sentences, only corpus maintainers can. We will someday add the possibility for users to delete their own sentences, but in the meantime, if you want to have a sentence deleted, add a comment on the sentence asking for deletion and explain why you'd like to delete it.
translations: ita:Al momento, gli utenti normali non possono eliminare le frasi, solo i responsabili del corpus possono. Un giorno aggiung
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by sacredceltic (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
